items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Abhijato: "Remember the immortal Queen song 'Bohemian Rhapsody' with the iconic line "It Doesn't Really Matter to Me, To Me...?" It kickstarts an awesome sequence of musical composition. For the Windies opener Shai Hope in the tri-series so far, considering his fluid style of shots which is akin to music, this line suits rather well. The opener lays the solid bases, all the while not caring about the combination at the top or the bowling opposition at hand. After all, it doesn't matter to him, to him...!"
items.text: full ball outside off, steered past point with an open bat face
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run
